mapper.select: update INSBDevice set operator = #{operator},modifytime = #{modifytime},noti = #{noti},agentid = #{agentid},deptid = #{deptid},authcode = #{authcode},authtype = #{authtype},bindingstate = #{bindingstate},activatetime = #{activatetime},agentflag = #{agentflag},depttier = #{depttier},devbrand = #{devbrand},devtype = #{devtype},imei = #{imei},serialnum = #{serialnum},opersystem = #{opersystem},devsource = #{devsource} where id = #{id}
